How many people are affected by Danon disease ?,"Danon disease is a rare condition, but the exact prevalence is unknown.",GHR,Danon disease
What are the genetic changes related to Danon disease ?,"Danon disease is caused by mutations in the LAMP2 gene. The LAMP2 gene provides instructions for making a protein called lysosomal associated membrane protein-2 (LAMP-2), which, as its name sugg
